Meet Bobby!

We are so excited to be one of the few premier retailers to introduce the new Bobby Berk line of furniture.  Bobby, best known as the design guru on Netflix's Queer Eye,has launched his own hip and urban furniture collection.  Thru A.R.T. furniture he has used his youthful spirit and relaxed lifestyle to create what we believe is the perfect new collection of furniture pieces for today's stylish consumers.  Come into your local West Coast Living store to touch, feel and be inspired by the new Bobby Berk collection!
